casebody.data:
Watson E. Trigger v. Malcolm Harris Livick, Et Al. September 5, 1975. Record No. 740747.

Present, I’Anson, C.J., Carrico, Harrison, Harman, Poff and Compton, JJ.

B. G. Stephenson (George H. Balthrop; B. G. Stephenson, Ltd,., on brief), for plaintiff in error. /. Marshall Coleman (Philip Lee Lotz; Lotz, Black, Coleman & Gudal, on brief), for defendants in error.

Richmond
